original_text: In a big house, there are different kinds of dishes. There are some dishes that people have made from gold or from silver. They see those dishes as valuable things. There are also dishes that people have made from wood or from clay. Those dishes are not special things and they may get dirty.
korean_text: 큰 집에는 금 그릇과 은 그릇뿐 아니라 나무 그릇과 질그릇도 있어 귀하게 쓰는 것도 있고 천하게 쓰는 것도 있나니

sentences.original_text: there are different kinds of dishes
that people have made from gold or from silver
They see those dishes as valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 그릇들을 귀한 것으로 봅니다

sentences.original_text: that people have made from wood or from clay
Those dishes are not special things
